Interface InterruptHandler

All Known Subinterfaces:
Kernel
public interface InterruptHandler

Interface for kernel component that handles interrupts representing kernel events such as timeouts and completion of device I/O operations.

Version:
8/3/15
Author:
Stephan Jamieson

Field Summary
static int TIME_OUT
          Identifies a time_out interrupt.
static int WAKE_UP
          Identifies completion of a device I/O request.
 
Method Summary
 void interrupt(int interruptType, Object... varargs)
          Invoke the interrupt handler, providing the interrupt type and zero or more arguments.
 

Field Detail

TIME_OUT

static final int TIME_OUT
Identifies a time_out interrupt. Optionally, a call to the interrupt with this code, may provide the ID of the process to be preempted - should correspond to that currently executing!

See Also:
Constant Field Values

WAKE_UP

static final int WAKE_UP
Identifies completion of a device I/O request. Device ID and Process ID are required parameters.

See Also:
Constant Field Values
Method Detail

interrupt

void interrupt(int interruptType,
               Object... varargs)
Invoke the interrupt handler, providing the interrupt type and zero or more arguments.
